about.title: About Me
description: Originally from Tunisia and currently based in France, my name is Nader Chatti, I'm a passionate Fullstack developer and software engineer with a Master's degree, specializing in modern web technologies and software architecture.
Currently focused on freelance work and building SaaS products, I combine my multicultural background with technical expertise to create efficient and scalable solutions.
